head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RAWSON, REBECCA HOBART

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RAWSON, REBECCA HOBART

block.p: RAWSON--Rebecca Hobart, 59, died peacefully on April 2, 2007. Loving mother of Jennifer C. Rawson. Devoted daughter of Edward Rawson. Adored sister of Edward Rawson (Ric). Rebecca will be missed and always remembered by family and friends. A memorial service will be held at The Cathedral of St. John the Divine. For additional details, please call (212) 779-9595. If desired, memorial contributions may be made to The Cathedral of St. John Divine, 1047 Amsterdam Avenue, New York, NY 10025.
